remarks: The join of two different lattice lines in a lattice plane equals the plane.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
2llnj.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
2llnj.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
2llnj.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
2llnj.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
2llnjN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. N /\ Y e. N /\ W e. P ) /\ ( X .<_ W /\ Y .<_ W /\ X =/= Y ) ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) = W ) $.
